ShortDescription.Value: A WriteEverywhere-Module that replaces Vanilla Signs with Thailand ones.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Thailand Vanilla Theme Overrider
Hello and สวัสดี. This is a Vanilla Theme Overrider that turns Vanilla Signs, Road Markings and Decals to Thailand ones. **Please use one Vanilla Overrider at one time!**
---
## Functions - Works **automatically**, you don't need any knowledge whatsoever! - Variable working Street Signs - Variable working Bus/Tram Signs with max. 5 Lines displayed - Bicycle Parking Spots
---
## Requirements - [Write Everywhere](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92908/Windows) – required
---
## Check out the corrosponding Sign Pack or the other Country Packs/Overrider - [Thai Signs](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/133249/Windows) - [Other Countries](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/authors/gohkenytp)
---
## Credits and Special Thanks - To **Klyte45** for the WriteEverywhere mod. - **Klyte45**s [Vanilla Theme Override Mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/106877/Windows), without that I would have lost my mind. - **UnMaestro** for his Road Sign packs ---
## Enjoy & Share Your Feedback!
